name: Firefox - Awesome Bar Popup
description:
For all intents and purposes this is style 19308 by user 18532 without the options provided. It modifies a few font-sizes and changes the color of the URLs to green. The style also removes rounded borders and adds a few very minor tweaks.

This style is for personal use only.
additional_info:
Of course, all the credit goes to user 18532. Thank you for doing a style like this!
